metadata.task_description: Create a new issue with title 'Fix data synchronization bug', add description 'Investigate and resolve data sync issues between services', set priority to 'High', assign project as 'Galactus' and status as 'TODO'

judgement.reasoning: The agent successfully completed all parts of the user's request. It navigated to Linear.app, opened the new issue modal, set the title ('Fix data synchronization bug') and description ('Investigate and resolve data sync issues between services'), set the priority to 'High', and assigned the project to 'Galactus'. The status was implicitly set to 'TODO', which matched the requirement. The agent also took appropriate screenshots at major UI state changes as requested. The execution was efficient and accurate.
